tool_description: An API of the most relevant architecture projects around the world.
name: Architecture
title: Architecture

api_list.name: Get Individual Projects Source
api_list.description: Gets projects from a specific category.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://architecture.p.rapidapi.com/projects/archdaily_top10"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "architecture.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

print(response.json())
